full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, , KHAMS CHAB MDO PHYOGS KYI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO LCAGS RA NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I SHO MO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @069A *, ,(CES KHAMS CHAB MDO PHYOGS KYI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO LCAGS RA NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I SHO MO 'DI SHIN TU RGYAS SHIN 'PHRIN LAS KHYAB CHE BAS KUN LA PHAN CHE BAR MTHONG NAS DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I SMON TSIG TU BIKshU MANGGA LA SAMBHA WAS BRIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
